Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
Deprecated Classes
org.glassfish.jersey.server.mvc.freemarker.FreemarkerProperties
          Use properties from FreemarkerMvcFeature instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.client.filter.HttpBasicAuthFilter
          since 2.5: use HttpAuthenticationFeature instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.client.filter.HttpDigestAuthFilter
          since 2.5: use HttpAuthenticationFeature instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.mvc.jsp.JspProperties
          Use properties from JspMvcFeature instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.mvc.MvcProperties
          Use properties from MvcFeature instead. 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.glassfish.jersey.apache.connector.ApacheClientProperties.HTTP_PARAMS
          Use ApacheClientProperties.REQUEST_CONFIG instead. Will be removed in one of the next releases. 
org.glassfish.jersey.apache.connector.ApacheClientProperties.PROXY_PASSWORD
          Use ClientProperties.PROXY_PASSWORD instead. Will be removed in one of the next releases. 
org.glassfish.jersey.apache.connector.ApacheClientProperties.PROXY_URI
          Use ClientProperties.PROXY_URI instead. Will be removed in one of the next releases. 
org.glassfish.jersey.apache.connector.ApacheClientProperties.PROXY_USERNAME
          Use ClientProperties.PROXY_USERNAME instead. Will be removed in one of the next releases. 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.glassfish.jersey.server.monitoring.ApplicationStatistics.getDestroyTime()
          deprecated since 2.5 (destroy time will always be null). Use ContainerLifecycleListener.onShutdown(org.glassfish.jersey.server.spi.Container) to listen on the destroy. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.model.RuntimeResource.getFirstParentResource(Resource)
          Please use Resource.getParent() directly instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.validation.ValidationConfig.setConstraintValidatorFactory(ConstraintValidatorFactory)
          use ValidationConfig.constraintValidatorFactory(javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorFactory) instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.validation.ValidationConfig.setMessageInterpolator(MessageInterpolator)
          use ValidationConfig.messageInterpolator(javax.validation.MessageInterpolator) instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.validation.ValidationConfig.setParameterNameProvider(ParameterNameProvider)
          use ValidationConfig.parameterNameProvider(javax.validation.ParameterNameProvider) instead. 
org.glassfish.jersey.server.validation.ValidationConfig.setTraversableResolver(TraversableResolver)
          use ValidationConfig.traversableResolver(javax.validation.TraversableResolver) instead. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.glassfish.jersey.server.mvc.Viewable(String, Object, Class)
          The resolvingClass is obsolete and will be removed in the future releases. There is no replacement. 
 

Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
org.glassfish.jersey.server.mvc.Template.resolvingClass
          This attribute is obsolete and will be removed in the future releases. There is no replacement.
